input_email_body:
Subject: Concerns About Data Analytics Tools

A financial firm is facing issues with their data analytics tools, which often crash under high load You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. This may be due to insufficient resources or software conflicts My name is Jane Smith.. After updating the software, increasing RAM, and checking system compatibility, the issues still persist.
